original_text: But the people did not listen to Moses. Moses and the Lord's Covenant Box stayed in the camp. But still the men went up to the top of the hills.
korean_text: 그들이 그래도 산 꼭대기로 올라갔고 여호와의 언약궤와 모세는 진영을 떠나지 아니하였더라

sentences.original_text: But the people did not listen to Moses
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 백성들은 모세의 말을 듣지 않았다

sentences.original_text: Moses and the Lord's Covenant Box stayed in the camp
But still the men went up to the top of the hills
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그 남자들은 여전히 언덕 꼭대기로 올라갔다
